籤詩版本二:
Hoʻohui hou ʻia ke aniani he tausani makahiki, noi ka wahine i ke kāne e mare hou
Mai ia manawa, ua hoʻololi ʻia ka ʻohana, a ua hoʻohui ʻia nā pōmaikaʻi i nā keiki a me nā moʻopuna.
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram o ka hui hou ʻana o nā aniani.
He hana paʻakikī a he pipiʻi nā mea a pau.
解曰: ʻO ka ʻeli ʻana i ke one i ke gula. E holo ana i ka deragona a e holo ana i ka tiga. ʻOiai he luhi. Aia kekahi mea hoʻohui i loko.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Yulianhui ʻumi hoa
I ka Song Dynasty, ua male ʻo Qian Yulian iā Wang Shipeng. I ka hele ʻana o Shi Peng i Beijing e lawe i ka hoʻokolokolo, ua koi ʻo Sun Ruquan waiwai iā Yulian e mare hou iā ia.
Ua hōʻole ʻo Qian Yulian i ka noi a Sun Ruquan waiwai a makemake ʻo ia e mare iā Wang Shipeng, he haumāna ʻilihune mai Wenzhou i hoʻolimalima ʻia e "Jing Chai".
Ma hope mai, ua lanakila ʻo Wang Shipeng i ka makana mua. No kona hōʻole ʻana e mare ʻia e ke Kuhina Nui ʻo Wanqi, ua hoʻouna ʻia ʻo ia e noho luna kānāwai ma Chaoyang mamao. Ua hoʻololi malū ʻo Sun Ruquan i ka palapala ʻohana a Wang Shipeng i "leka oki male" a hoʻopunipuni ʻo ia iā Yulian i mea e hoʻopunipuni ʻia. mai ka ʻāina ʻo Fujian a lawe ʻia ʻo ia i kaikamahine hānai.
Ua manaʻo ʻo Yulian ua make ʻo Shipeng. ʻElima makahiki ma hope mai, ʻo Wang Shipeng ke kiaʻāina o Jiʻan. I kekahi lā, ua mālama ʻo ia i kahi hana hoʻomanaʻo ma ka luakini Taoist e hoʻomanaʻo ai i kāna wahine i hala. Ua hele ʻo Yulian i ka luakini Taoist Jiʻan e puhi ka mea ʻala, a ua hui hou ʻo Wang lāua ʻo Qian.
聖意: ʻAʻole maikaʻi ka hale iā ʻoe iho, ʻO ke kauwela a me ka hoʻoilo ka pōmaikaʻi, E pōmaikaʻi ka waiwai i ka hāʻule a me ka hoʻoilo, pōmaikaʻi ka ʻoihana. Hiki ke loaʻa ka poʻe, ʻAʻole maikaʻi nā hoʻopiʻi lehulehu. ʻAʻole mālama ka neʻe ʻana, Nalo ka waiwai, ʻo ka maʻi lohi, Pule no ka pōmaikaʻi, maikaʻi nā mauna a me nā lua kupapaʻu.
